name: Rapid Deployment
text:
**Choose one —**
- Move up to 3 spaces and place the Turret into a space adjacent to you; it counts as an obstacle.
- Defeat a minion adjacent to you.
_(The Turret is not a token and remains in play between rounds.)_

name: Ramshackle Turret
text:
Move up to 3 spaces and place the Turret into a space adjacent to you; it counts as an obstacle.
_(The Turret is not a token and remains in play between rounds.)_

name: Salvage Parts
text:
**Choose one —**
- Place the Turret into an adjacent space. It counts as an obstacle.
- Remove the Turret; move up to 3 spaces.
- Remove the Turret; you may retrieve a discarded card.

name: Disruptor Jolt
text: **This turn:** Before any enemy hero in radius of the Turret performs a primary action, that hero discards a card, if able; if they discard a card, deactivate this effect.

name: Makeshift Minigun
text: Target a unit in range of both you and the Turret. If the target is in a straight line from you, and in a straight line from the Turret, gain +2 ::attack:: Attack.

name: Early Prototype
text: If you are in radius of the Turret, swap with a unit or a token in radius of the Turret, then remove the Turret

name: Disruptor Pulse
text: **This turn:** Before any enemy hero in radius of the Turret performs a primary action, that hero discards a card, if able; if they discard a card, deactivate this effect.

name: Gatling Gun
text: Target a unit in range of both you and the Turret. If the target is in a straight line from you, and in a straight line from the Turret, gain +2 ::attack:: Attack.

name: Updated Design
text: If you are in radius of the Turret, swap with a unit or a token in radius of the Turret.

name: Deployable Barrier
text:
Place up to 2 ::token_barrier:: barrier tokens in radius, with at least one of them adjacent to the Turret.
You and friendly heroes gain +1 ::defense:: Defense for each Barrier token they are adjacent to.

name: Steam Discharge
text:
Target a unit in range adjacent to the Turret.
May repeat once on a different enemy unit.

name: Self-Destruct
text: Up to two enemy heroes in radius of the Turret discard a card, if able. Remove the Turret.

name: Disruptor Grid
text: **This turn:** Before any enemy hero in radius of the Turret performs a primary action, that hero discards a card, or is defeated; if they discard a card, deactivate this effect.

name: Supercharged Cannon
text: Target a unit in range of both you and the Turret. If the target is in a straight line from you, and in a straight line from the Turret, gain +3 ::attack:: Attack.

name: Perfected Design
text:
If you are in radius of the Turret,
**Choose one —**
- Swap with a unit or a token in radius of the Turret.
- Place yourself into a space in radius of the Turret.

name: Deployable Bastion
text:
Place up to 3 ::token_barrier:: barrier tokens in radius, with at least one of them adjacent to the Turret.
You and friendly heroes gain +1 ::defense:: Defense for each Barrier token they are adjacent to.

name: Flame Belcher
text:
Target a unit in range adjacent to the Turret.
May repeat up to two times on different enemy units.

name: Emergency Protocol
text: Up to two enemy heroes heroes in radius of the Turret discard a card, or are defeated. Remove the Turret.
